data.nrql: SELECT latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Updated' FROM postgresql_database FACET postgresql_database_name
SELECT uniqueCount(postgresql_database_name) AS 'Databases' FROM postgresql_database FACET postgresql_instance_name

presentation.title: Instance Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Instance of this Database

data.nrql: SELECT sum(active_connections) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Active Connections (Sessions)
presentation.notes: Number of backends currently connected to this database

data.nrql: SELECT average(block_reads_rate) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Block Reads (Reads per Second)
presentation.notes: Number of disk blocks read in this database

data.nrql: SELECT average(buffer_hit_ratios) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Buffer Hit Ratios (Percent)
presentation.notes: Ratio of read buffer hits to total reads

data.nrql: SELECT sum(buffer_hits_rate) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Buffer Hits (Reads per Second)
presentation.notes: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)

data.nrql: SELECT sum(transactions_committed_rate) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Transactions Committed (Transactions per Second)
presentation.notes: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

data.nrql: SELECT sum(transactions_rolled_back_rate) FROM postgresql_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Transactions Rolled Back (Transactions per Second)
presentation.notes: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back
